text.section: The Secretary shall adopt rules and regulations for establishing, licensing, and operating private group homes.

These rules and regulations shall ensure at least:
That the proposed staff will be adequate to supervise properly the individuals in the private group home;
That the procedure under which the proposed private group home will receive, investigate, document, and dispose of written complaints from neighborhood residents is acceptable; and
That the proposed care or treatment:
Reasonably can be expected to benefit the individuals in the private group home; and
Will be provided by an adequate staff or, under agreement, by a provider of mental health services.
